mapper.insert: insert into attfl_mgmt (attfl_id, mgmt_type, use_yn, rgst_dttm) values (#{attflId}, #{mgmtType}, 'Y', now())

insert into attfl_mgmt_detl (attfl_id, attfl_seq, file_mgmt_type, file_mgmt_detl_type, file_save_path, save_file_nm, ortx_file_nm, file_mg, file_type_info, attfl_istc, use_yn, rgst_dttm) values ( #{attflId}, (select coalesce(max(attfl_seq), 0) + 1 as attfl_seq from attfl_mgmt_detl where attfl_id = #{attflId}), #{fileMgmtType}, #{fileMgmtDetlType}, #{fileSavePath}, #{saveFileNm}, #{ortxFileNm}, #{fileMg}, #{fileTypeInfo}, #{attflIstc}, 'Y', now() )
mapper.select: WITH max_file_id AS ( SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(attfl_id, 4) AS INTEGER)) AS max_sequence_number FROM attfl_mgmt WHERE attfl_id LIKE #{mgmtType} || '%' ) SELECT #{mgmtType} || LPAD(COALESCE((SELECT max_sequence_number + 1 FROM max_file_id), 1)::text, 10, '0') AS attflId
select attfl_id, mgmt_type, use_yn, rgst_dttm from attfl_mgmt where attfl_id = #{attflId} and use_yn = 'Y'

select attfl_id, attfl_seq, file_mgmt_type, file_mgmt_detl_type, file_save_path, save_file_nm, ortx_file_nm, file_mg, file_type_info, attfl_istc, use_yn, rgst_dttm from attfl_mgmt_detl where attfl_id = #{attflId} and use_yn = 'Y' order by attfl_seq asc

select attfl_id, attfl_seq, file_mgmt_type, file_mgmt_detl_type, file_save_path, save_file_nm, ortx_file_nm, file_mg, file_type_info, attfl_istc, use_yn, rgst_dttm from attfl_mgmt_detl where attfl_id = #{attflId} and attfl_seq = #{attflSeq} order by attfl_seq asc
